resources.string: Try to guess what \ni s behind the picture. But be careful, otherwise you can\n get on a jug of poisoned wine!

But if youre lucky,
 you can get game points 
 that will be entered into
 the record table and
 will be immortalized there.

Most of all you can get 
 if you find a treasure chest! 
 Just not enough finding the royal family. 
 In last place if you collect 
an ancient manuscript.

Choose how many decanters
 
with poison will be in the game. 

 For each graph you lose 100 experience.
